headers.value: default-src 'self' https: data: blob:; connect-src 'self' https: http: ws: wss:; img-src 'self' https: data: blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; script-src 'self' https:; frame-ancestors https://*.telegram.org https://web.telegram.org; base-uri 'self';

ignoreCommand: if [ -z "$VERCEL_GIT_PREVIOUS_SHA" ]; then exit 1; fi; git diff --quiet "$VERCEL_GIT_PREVIOUS_SHA" "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_SHA" -- .
